title: How to Get Rid of Lint when Washing Clothes

steps.headline: Pour a half cup of vinegar per normal wash. Use slightly more for a large wash.
Throw the half cup into the rinse cycle.
steps.description: The vinegar will prevent the lint from forming.

text: Pour a half cup of vinegar per normal wash. Use slightly more for a large wash.  Wash as usual.  Throw the half cup into the rinse cycle. The vinegar will prevent the lint from forming.
